trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies how the ETW manifest for the event source is generated.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx XXX xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Generates a resources node under the localization folder for every satellite assembly provided.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A manifest is generated only the event source must be registered on the host computer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Causes an exception to be raised if any inconsistencies occur when writing the manifest file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x
